title: Opportunity for O/L candidates to obtain blessings
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A special opportunity has been provided for children who are sitting for G.C.E. Ordinary Level Examination this year to worship and obtain the blessings at the temple of the Sacred Tooth Relic.
This program is headed by Ven. Thibbatuwawe Sri Siddhartha Medhankara Thero who is in charge of Thewa from the Malwathu chapter, who had arranged this event for the fourth time this year.
Accordingly, this service is available today (21) and tomorrow (22).
Distribution suspended for filling stations if obstructions are caused: Energy Minister
